name: Beatrice
description: Not very sociable, has a unique personality and likes to daydream. But underneath her aloofness there lies a burning heart that loves everything and everyone in this world, and the desire to destroy everything evil and ugly.

passiveSkill.name: Heaven
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Beatrice appears, every Light, Healing, and Guardian class enemy on the enemy side increases her ATK by {placeholder}, and her HP Max by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Inferno
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Pray to the Chain of judgment. Beatrice attacks enemies in a cross pattern and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Has a {placeholder} chance to stun the target for 1 round."}

specialSkill.name: Underworld
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Beatrice summons the Soul Lock of the Kingdom. Attacks an enemy column and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Has a {placeholder} chance to stun the targets for 1 round.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Cleanse
normalSkill.description: Beatrice spins her chains around. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Pray to the Chain of judgment. Beatrice attacks enemies in a cross pattern and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Has a {placeholder} chance to stun the target for 1 round.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Beatrice appears, every Light, Healing, and Guardian class enemy on the enemy side increases her ATK by {placeholder}, and her HP Max by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: Beatrice summons the Soul Lock of the Kingdom. Attacks an enemy column and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Has a {placeholder} chance to stun the targets for 1 round.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
